articles.author: Mariella Moon
articles.title: Acer introduces a massive 57-inch ultrawide monitor at CES 2024 - Engadget
articles.description: The king-sized Predator Z57 will be available in North America in the second quarter of the year with prices starting at $2,500.
articles.content: Acer has announced a lengthy list of new products at CES 2024 in Las Vegas, including a 57-inch monitor with curvature designed to increase your field of vision and make you feel more immersed in a g… [+2037 chars]
